title:
Gear Shift-up Indicator - Speedster/VX220
Turbo
htmlContent:
Gear Shift-up Indicator - Speedster/VX220 Turbo

The Speedster/VX220 Turbo is equipped with an illuminated LED indicator to advise the driver when a higher gear needs to be selected during acceleration periods.

The indicator illuminates at the engine “red line” of 6 250 rpm, and is extinguished when the engine speed decreases to 6 150 rpm.
